entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 10:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
